title: Game UI Generator - AI-Powered Game UI Analysis & Implementation
meta_description: Transform your UI designs into production-ready code with the Game UI Generator. AI-powered analysis and code generation for game developers.
hero_title: Transform Game UI Designs into Production-Ready Code
hero_subtitle: Upload your UI design, our AI analyzes it and generates ready-to-use components for your game. Save hours of development time.
feature1_description: Our state-of-the-art AI recognizes UI elements like buttons, panels, and text fields from your designs.
feature2_description: Automatically generate structured JSON that defines UI hierarchy, properties, and relationships.
feature3_description: Import generated definitions directly into Cocos Creator with our specialized plugin.
feature4_description: Automatically extract and optimize assets from your designs for use in your game.
playground_formats: Supported formats: PSD, AI, XD, Sketch, Figma, PNG, JPG
playground_drop_text: Drop files here or click to browse
upload_instruction: Drag & drop a UI image or click to browse
premium_note: Full export functionality available in premium plans
showcase_subtitle: Browse our library of analyzed AI-generated game UIs and see how they transform into usable game interfaces
workflow_subtitle: From concept to implementation in minutes, not days
step_1_desc: Use Midjourney/Ideogram/ImageFX to generate a UI design, or upload an existing design image
step_2_desc: Our AI automatically analyzes the image, identifies all UI components, and extracts them
step_3_desc: Get structured JSON configuration with all extracted components ready for game engine implementation
step_4_desc: Import directly to Cocos Creator 3.8 with our plugin - no manual assembly required
comparison_subtitle: See why developers choose Game UI Generator over other solutions.
pain_points_subtitle: We've identified and addressed the biggest pain points in game UI implementation
pain_1_problem: Problem: Manually recreating UI designs in game engines is tedious and can take days or weeks.
pain_1_solution: Our Solution: Automatic analysis and JSON generation reduces implementation time by up to 94%, turning days of work into minutes.
pain_2_problem: Problem: Final game UI often doesn't match the original design due to manual implementation errors.
pain_2_solution: Our Solution: Pixel-perfect analysis ensures the final implementation matches the design exactly as intended.
pain_3_problem: Problem: Identifying UI components and their properties from flat designs is challenging.
pain_3_solution: Our Solution: AI-powered component recognition instantly identifies buttons, panels, text fields, and other UI elements with high accuracy.
pain_4_problem: Problem: Translating designs to different game engine formats requires specialized knowledge.
pain_4_solution: Our Solution: Built-in plugins for popular engines like Cocos Creator 3.8 allow one-click imports with proper formatting and structure.
pain_5_problem: Problem: Finding appropriate UI references for specific game types or functions is difficult.
pain_5_solution: Our Solution: Our categorized library of over 10,000 game UI screens provides instant inspiration and reference for any project.
pain_6_problem: Problem: Adapting UI from one platform to another requires significant rework.
pain_6_solution: Our Solution: Automatic detection of platform-specific patterns and intelligent suggestions for cross-platform adaptations.
pain_ai_1_problem: Problem: Tools like Midjourney, Ideogram, and ImageFX generate complete UI images that still require manual slicing and reassembly in game engines.
pain_ai_1_solution: Our Solution: Our tool automatically analyzes AI-generated images, extracts components, and creates ready-to-use assets and configurations.
pain_ai_2_problem: Problem: ChatGPT and similar tools can generate HTML prototypes, but sprites need to be manually created, styles are inconsistent, and they can't be directly used in Unity or Cocos Creator.
pain_ai_2_solution: Our Solution: Our Cocos Creator plugin enables direct import of analyzed UI with all components, maintaining consistent style without manual assembly.
testimonial1_text: Game UI Generator saved us weeks of development time. Our designers can now directly contribute to the implementation process.
testimonial2_text: We reduced our UI implementation time by 80% with Game UI Generator. It's now an essential part of our workflow.

cases_subtitle: How Game UI Generator transformed development workflows
case_1_quote: Game UI Generator transformed our workflow. What used to take our team weeks now takes days. The UI quality and consistency improved dramatically.
faq_subtitle: Get quick answers to common questions
faq1_question: How accurate is the UI element detection?
faq1_answer: Our AI achieves over 95% accuracy in detecting common UI elements like buttons, panels, labels, input fields, and specialized game UI components. The system continuously improves through machine learning.
faq2_answer: Currently, we provide direct integration with Cocos Creator through our plugin. Support for Unity and Unreal Engine is coming soon. However, the JSON output can be adapted for use with any engine.
faq3_question: What file formats can I upload?
faq3_answer: We support PSD, AI, XD, Sketch, Figma exports, as well as PNG and JPG files. For best results, layered design files are recommended.
faq4_answer: Yes, Team plan subscribers have access to our API for automation and integration into custom workflows.
faq5_answer: Absolutely! Our Free plan allows up to 5 UI screens per month with no credit card required.

glossary_subtitle: A comprehensive reference of UI design terminology, patterns, and concepts for game developers
glossary_intro: Understanding the specialized terminology of game UI design is essential for effective development and communication. This glossary provides definitions for common terms used in game UI design, development, and implementation, with a focus on concepts relevant to the Game UI Generator tool and Cocos Creator integration.
glossary_resources_item4: Layout Systems in Modern Game Engines
